# cscdm_record (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cscdm_record" "www_example_com" {
  zone_name = "example.com"
  type      = "A"
  key       = "www"
  value     = "127.0.0.1"
  ttl       = 300
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String)
- `type` (String)
- `value` (String)
- `zone_name` (String)

### Optional

- `priority` (Number)
- `ttl` (Number)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `last_updated` (String)
- `status` (String)
